1147:627: yato nāvitarkya nāvicārya vācaṃ bhāṣata ityālāpavikṣepau |
1147:629: vikṣepaśca santānakṣobhaṃ gāḍhamādadhātīti matvā yathā buddhena bhagavatā prāgbodhisattvabhūtenaivaṃ praṇidhānaṃ pravartitam |
1147:632: tathā buddhatvasāmyāt pratyekabuddhairatasteṣāmapi svabodhyadhigamāvasthāyāṃ pūrvaṃ praṇidhānādisāmarthena yasminnarthe yena prakāreṇa yasya śravaṇecchā tasya vijñāne tenaiva prakāreṇāśabdo'
1147:639: śuśrūṣā yasya yasyārthe yatra yatra yathā yathā |
1147:641: pi tasya tasya tathā tathā ||7|| iti
1147:648: evaṃ tarhi nitarāṃ dūrāddūratarādikaṃ praviśāmīti matiḥ |
1147:651: imāṃ mārgajñatāṃ dharmanidhyānakṣamaṇaviṣayāmaprāpya sa pudgalo na sambhavatyanyathādhigamābhāvādityanena ca mārgajñatāṃ sarvamārgaviṣayiṇīmāha |
1147:655: sau viśiṣṭo mārgastatsvabhāvā mārgajñatā kintarhi śrāvakādimārgasvabhāvāpīti |
1147:669: vastudharmo hyeṣa yat svalakṣaṇe vastuni sati tadgrāhakaṃ nirvikalpakaṃ jñānasvalakṣaṇamutpadyate |
1147:671: grāhakavikalpasya punaranādikālīnanirudhyamānarūpādigrāhakavikalpajñānasamākṣiptasvasantānavāsanāprabodhajanmatvānnāyaṃ niyamo grāhyavikalpe satyeva samudaya iti |
1147:672: tasmānmāyāsvabhāvanirmitapadārthasamānā eva te vitathaprakhyātirūpagrāhakavikalpena saṅgatatvāt pratyekabuddhāgrāhakatvenaiveṣṭavyā iti |
1147:677: samāhitāsamāhitāvasthāyāṃ te pratyekabuddhā yathākramaṃ naiva śroṣyantiḥ na sākṣātkariṣyanti grāhakavikalpākāreṇeti śeṣaḥ |
1147:681: māyānirmitasadṛśā iti kenacidākāreṇeti sādṛśyavacanāt sattvānāṃ māyāsvabhāvatā nirākṛteti prasaṅgāgatavikalpārthamāha |
1147:684: kinna te māyāvitatharūpāstataśca tāttvikasattvāstikaparidīpitaṃ na samyaknirdeśa iti matiḥ |
1147:687: yathā gajāde rūpeṇa māyā mṛcchakalādibhyo vivekenānupalambhamānatvānnānyā |
1147:696: yathā māyā tathā cāmī sattvādayo bhāvā iti svabhāvahetunā kasyacitprasiddhenārthena prasiddho'
1147:699: pi sattvā māyātmakā evāto na kiñcittāttvikasattvāstitvaṃ paridīpitamiti |
1147:704: na vidyate dvaidhīkāro nānātvaṃ yasya tattathoktam |
1147:706: tadayaṃ vākyārtho yasmādalīkarūpatayā māyopamāste sattvāstasmānmāyā ca sattvāścādvayametadadvaidhīkāram |
1147:712: vyāptāvevaṃ pratipāditāyāṃ kathaṃ māyopamo bhagavān sarvākāraguṇasampado heturityāha |
1147:718: yatra hi nāma nirvāṇamapi prativiśiṣṭaṃ dharmakāyamadvayajñānasvabhāvaṃ māyāsvapnasamānaṃ vadāmi |
1147:719: tatra kiṃ punaranyaṃ dharmaṃ rūpakāyaṃ na vadāmi |
1147:722: yasmādyathoktasvabhāva eva bhagavānabhimukhīkriyamāṇaḥ sarvaguṇasampado hetuḥ pramāṇabādhitasvarūpatvenānyathā viparyāsa iti bhāvaḥ |
1147:725: anyathā tīrthikānāmiva prādeśikaśūnyatāsadbhāvena bhāvābhyupagamato muktyanupapattirityabhiprāyavān pariharannāha |
1147:730: nirvāṇādanyaḥ kaścit prativiśiṣṭo dharmo na sambhavati |
1147:732: yadi nirvāṇādapi kaścidanyo viśiṣṭataro dharmaḥ sambhavet tadā tamapi dharmaṃ māyādisadṛśaṃ vadeyamiti |
1147:736: sa hetuḥ sarvadṛṣṭīnāṃ kleśotpattirna taṃ vinā |
1147:742: pi pratyekabuddhānāṃ viśiṣṭo mārga iti kathanāya praśnayannāha |
1147:744: grāhyagrāhakavikalpayoryathākramaṃ prahāṇāprahāṇamityevaṃrūpeṇāsyāḥ pratyekabuddhamārgātmakāyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ kathyamānāyāḥ kīdṛgvidhagotrakāḥ pudgalāḥ pratyeṣakā grāhakā bhaviṣyanti |
1147:747: avinivartanīyā iti nirvedhabhāgīyādhigamenāvaivartikāḥ pratyekabodhau ta eva svabodhyabhilāṣādbodhisattvāḥ |
1147:752: arhanto vā kṣīṇāśravā iti prahīṇasvadarśanamārgāvaraṇatvena pūjārhāḥ |
1147:753: anena ca padatrayeṇa pratyekabodhau yathākramaṃ samudānītagotrakā dharmatāpratilabdhagotrakāsta eva niyatagotrakāḥ pudgalā ityākhyātam |
1147:758: pi pratyekabuddhāḥ kathaṃ na kecit pratyeṣikā iti |
1147:761: atreti pratyekabuddhamārgādhigamakāle paropadeśanairarthakyāt svayaṃbodhena pratyekabuddhānāmiti bhāvaḥ |
1147:767: tasmādyenaiva kāraṇena nairarthakyena sūcanādi na kriyate |
1147:768: tenaiva kāraṇena kaścit pratyeṣako na bhaviṣyati |
1147:770: yathā'vidyamānasvabhāvamapi nirmitapuṣpaṃ pratiniyatadeśādirūpeṇāvicāraikaramaṇīyatayā pratibhāsate tadvadvastubhūtādhāramantareṇāpi pratiniyatādhigamadharmaprāptiriti sūcanāyā'
1147:806: yasmānna manonirjātāni tattvataḥ kānicitpuṣpāṇi grāhyagrāhakabhāvasyālīkatvāditi śeṣaḥ |
1147:808: anirjātānyetāni puṣpāṇīti vacanena puṣpāṇāṃ svarūpamapratiṣiddhaṃ janmaniṣedhāttarhi nityatvamabhyupagataṃ taccāyuktamityāha |
1147:815: tatra grāhyavikalpaprahāṇena pratyekabuddhādhigamaṃ śrāvakebhyo viśinaṣṭi grāhakavikalpaprahāṇābhāvena ca pratyekabuddhebhyo'
1147:817: ādhāreṇa cādhigamasyāsādhāraṇyamiti viśiṣṭaḥ pratyekabuddhānāṃ mārgo yathoktaśrāvakacatuḥsatyākārānupalambhabhāvanayā yathāvastu pratītyasamutpādānugatayā bodhisattvena parījñeyaḥ |
1147:905: evaṃ samudaye nirodhe mārge pratipattavyamityete ṣoḍaśacittakṣaṇā darśanamārgaḥ |
1147:910: tathāhi prayogamārge duḥkhasatyādhipateryasya dharmasya pūrvavicāraṇāmadhipatiṃ kṛtvā pratyātmaṃ duḥkhasatyānubhāvijñānamanāśravaṃ yena duḥkhadarśanaprahātavyaṃ kleśaṃ prajahāti |
1147:912: yena jñānena kṣāntyanantaraṃ vimuktiṃ sākṣātkaroti taducyate duḥkhadharmajñānam |
1147:913: duḥkhadharmajñānasyānantaraṃ duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāntau duḥkhadharmajñāne cānvaya eṣa āryadharmāṇāmiti pratyātmaṃ yatpratyakṣānubhāvijñānamanāśravaṃ taducyate duḥkhānvayajñānakṣāntiḥ |
1147:916: evamavaśiṣṭeṣvapi satyeṣu yathāyogaṃ kṣāntayo jñānāni ca veditavyānīti ṣoḍaśakṣaṇika eva darśanamārgo yuktaḥ |
1147:922: pyapūrvadarśanavaikalyādanvayajñānakṣaṇo na darśanamārga iti dvādaśakṣaṇika eva syāt |
1147:933: ata eva nirodhaḥ sakṣātkṛtastasya cānyathānupapattyā mārgo bhāvitaḥ |
1147:939: muktistvanupalambhadṛṣṭestatparikarmabhūtatvena tadartheva pariśiṣṭākārabhāvaneti yathoditavidhinā niḥsvabhāvā nirātmānaḥ śūnyā iti vā sarvadharmān bhāvayato bhāvanābalaniṣpattau |
1147:941: ko'nyo na dṛṣṭo bhāgaḥ syādyaḥ pramāṇaiḥ parīkṣyate ||
1147:944: nanvekasminneva kṣaṇe sarvākārasya pratividdhatvādākārāntareṇa darśanamārge bhāvanāntarānupapatteḥ pratipannakatvādivyavasthā kathamiti śreyo niryāṇamārgānusāriṇāṃ matiḥ |
1147:954: tatraiva tasya tatpratibaddhāvaraṇaprahāṇāt prāmāṇyaṃ nānyatra kṣaṇikatvādivat |
1147:955: evamāryāṇāṃ pṛthagjanebhyaḥ ko viśeṣa ityapi na vaktavyam |
1147:974: yaḥ pratītyasamutpādaḥ śūnyatā saiva te matā |
1147:988: tadubhayavyatiriktaparadharmābhāvāt kathaṃ rūpādāvanyatra ca prajñāpāramitā na gaveṣitavyeti |
1147:993: ato rūpādyaviśuddhamādhārātmakaṃ viśiṣṭakāraṇaṃ suviśuddhasya tathāgatasya na bhavatīti |
1147:995: tadvyatiriktānyadharmasya tāttvikatve tathaiva viparyāsa iti nāpyanyatra |
1147:999: atastayoḥ paryāyeṇāvasthiterananujñānamityevaṃ sarvadharmālambane duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāntirutpadyata iti |
1147:1005: iti nyāyādrūpādikāraṇamahattvādyanupapattau tadālambananirjātāyāḥ kathaṃ prajñāpāramitāyā mahattvādikamiti |
1147:1021: pūrvavadākāśāparimāṇatayā teṣāmaparimāṇatā rūpāderniḥsvabhāvatvena śāśvatocchedādyantābhāvādanantatetyevaṃ sarvadharmālambane yathākramaṃ duḥkhe dharmajñānam |
1147:1036: evaṃ prathamārambaṇānantatayā hetvākāraṃ pratiṣidhya samudayākārapratiṣedhārthaṃ dvitīyārambaṇānantatāṃ kathayannāha |
1147:1042: nanu yadanvayavyatirekānuvidhāyi yatkāryaṃ tattasya heturiti pūrvānto dṛśyate |
1147:1073: yadyucitarūpeṇāpi prakāradvayena sattvānantatā na bhavati kena punastarhi prakāreṇetyāha |
1147:1095: yatretyādi yatra saṃvṛtimātreṇa kācittāttvikī sattvaparidīpanā kṛtā tatra kā sattvānantatā'
1147:1123: ato yatra svalakṣaṇe saṅketaḥ kṛto na tena vyavahārastatkālānanupāyitvāditi śabdavācyakalpanākalaṅkānaṅkitarūpatvādādiviśuddhatvam |
1147:1124: yena ca vyavahāro na tatra saṅketaḥ kṛtastasya prāgdṛṣṭatvāditi |
1147:1127: evaṃ hi tattvato vācyatvaṃ nirākṛtaṃ na tu vasturūpam |
1147:1129: yogādinā sattvānantatā paridīpiteti śakrābhiprāya eva vyākhyāta ityapare nānumanyanta |
1147:1139: ṛṣayo viśvāmitraprabhṛtayaḥ kiyanmātreṇa yathoktadeśanayā grāhyagrāhakanairātmyaṃ pratividhyopetya dānamudānamadhigamaharṣavacanamudānayanti smodīritavantaḥ |
1147:1160: "prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthitasya vastuto dharmadhātusvabhāvatayā rūpādīnāṃ tathāgatatvāvadhāraṇamityevaṃ sarvadharmālambane samudaye dharmajñānamutpadyata"iti |
1147:1180: tathāgato'rhan samyaksambuddha ityebhistribhiḥ padaiḥ śāstṛtvasampadaṃ darśayati |
1147:1183: tatra yathaiva te dharmā vyavasthitāstathaiva gadanāttathā dharmadaiśikatvādvaktṛtvasampaduktā |
1147:1191: tadevamaviparītadharmadaiśikatvena sarvakleśaprahāṇena sarvākāradharmāvabodhena ca śāstṛtvasampadasādhāraṇā paripūrṇā ca bhagavataḥ kathitā |
1147:1195: śrāvakapratyekabuddhāstu yadyapi bhūtaśāstāraḥ sarvakleśaprahāṇānna tu sarvākāraśāstāraḥ sarvākārasarvadharmānavabodhāt |
1147:1196: bhagavān punaryathoktanyāyena bhūtaśāstā sarvākāraśāstā ceti pratipāditam |
1147:1207: prajñāyāḥ pūrvaparikarmabhūtatvena puraścaraṇaṃ caraṇamiti kṛtvā vidyāyāstu pūrvagrahaṇaṃ tatpariśuddhyā śīlasamādhyoḥ pariśuddhitaḥ |
1147:1208: tathā hi prajñayā cakṣuṣeva paśyaṃstābhyāñca śīlasamādhibhyāṃ caraṇābhyāmiva gacchan gantavyamanuprāpnotīti vidyācaraṇaśabdena tistraḥ śikṣā nirdiśyante |
1147:1211: tathā hi lokottareṇa mārgeṇa śobhanaṃ jñāna prahāṇasampadaṃ gataḥ |
1147:1216: tathā hyātmaviparyāsena bāhyavītarāgā na śobhanaṃ gatāḥ |
1147:1218: aśaikṣāḥ punaḥ sarvajñeyeṣu jñānavibandhānna niḥśeṣaṃ gatāḥ |
1147:1222: tathā hi bhagavāṃstriḥkṛtvo rātrestriḥkṛtvo divasasya buddhacakṣuṣā lokaṃ vyavalokayati ko hīyate ko vardhata ityādibhirākārairdvitīyaṃ bhavyavinayanaṃ karma darśayati |
1147:1224: bhavyābhavyāllokān vyavalokya bhagavān ye puruṣā eva damyā damanārhā damayituṃ vā śakyā bhavyāstān vinayati |
1147:1229: durdamānāmapi keṣāñcit puruṣadamyānāṃ tīvrarāgadveṣamohamānānāmāryasundarānandāṅgulīmāloruvilvākāśyapamahārājakapphiṇaprabhṛtīnāṃ vināyaka iti pradarśanārtham |
1147:1230: tacca bhavyavinayanaṃ karma yatra sthitaṃ taddarśayati |
1147:1233: tathāpi yatra tvāryasatyadarśanaṃ śrāmaṇyaphalaprāptiśca prajñāyate tatra mukhyato yathārthānuśāsanaṃ bhagavataḥ śāstṛkarmasthitiḥ |
1147:1250: punarapi te devaputrāstathāgatānubhāvena samudaye tṛtīyakṣaṇākāraṃ pratipāditavanta ityāha |
1147:1252: tattvenānutpādarūpāpi saṃvṛtyā prajñāpāramitā sarvajñatāyāḥ samutpādiketi sarvabālajanātikrāntatvādāścaryam |
